item.description:
This meeting will be dedicated to a full recap of OpenForce '09 - the annual DotNetNuke convention that coincides with DevConnections in Las Vegas.

You'll hear about the OpenForce presentations, new features coming in DotNetNuke, and new technologies on the DotNetNuke horizon.

If you're wondering what DotNetNuke is all about, currently using DotNetNuke to build/host a site, or responsible for keeping up with future direction - then this meeting is a can't miss!
item.name: OpenForce '09 Recap
